headline.print_headline: Central Illinois County Allows Gay Marriage, Follows Chicago Ruling
headline.main: Central Illinois County Allows Gay Marriage, Follows Chicago Ruling

lead_paragraph: Same-sex couples in the central Illinois county that includes the state's largest university can get a marriage license immediately and won't have to wait to tie the knot until a state law legalizing gay marriage takes effect in June, the county clerk said Wednesday.
